metadata.title: Thursday, 21st October, 2021
metadata.session: FIRST SESSION OF THE THIRTEENTH ASSEMBLY

questions.minister: Minister of Home Affairs and Internal Security
parts: (a) when the newly constructed police station in Chikankata District will become operational; and
(b) when the staff houses at the police station will be occupied.

questions.minister: Minister of Infrastructure, Housing and Urban Development
parts: (a) when the construction of the following acrow bridges in Kanchibiya Parliamentary Constituency will resume:
(b) what the cause of the delay in resuming the projects is.

questions.minister: Minister of Local Government and Rural Development
parts: (a) when the construction of the Kabwe Main Bus Station in Kabwe District will be completed;
(b) what the cause of the delay in completing the project is;
(c) what the cost of the outstanding works is; and
(d) what the time frame for the completion of the outstanding works is.

questions.minister: Minister of Local Government and Rural Development
parts: (a) why rehabilitation works on the Chalabesa-Kabinga road in Kanchibiya District have stalled;
(b) when the works will resume; and
(c) whether the works will resume before the onset of the rains, to avoid the Kabinga Chiefdom being cut off from the rest of the District.

questions.minister: Minister of Infrastructure, Housing and Urban Development
parts: (a) when the construction of Mufumbwe Boarding Secondary School in Mufumbwe District will be completed;
(b) what the cause of the delay in completing the project is;
(c) what the cost of the outstanding works on the project is; and
(d) what the time frame for the completion of the project is. ___________________________
